Business Accomplishments

Roger Jenkins is known as one of the most highly rewarded financial experts in the U.K.

Roger Jenkins was executive chairman of Barclays Investment Banking and Investment Management in the Middle East.

Background

The son of an oil refinery manager, Roger Jenkins was educated in Edinburgh, Scotland where he earned a BA in economics from Heriot Watt University. He and his brother, David, were both talented athletes (Roger was a sprinter), but it was David who won a silver medal for Great Britain for his 400m relay performance during the 1972 Olympics in Munich.
